channel.title: Wages on rs.io
channel.description: Recent content in Wages on rs.io

item.title: Bukowskiâ€™s Park Bench
item.description: They call it “9 to 5.” It’s never 9 to 5, there’s no free lunch break at those places, in fact, at many of them in order to keep your job you don’t take lunch. Then there’s OVERTIME and the books never seem to get the overtime right and if you complain about that, there’s another sucker to take your place. You know my old saying, “Slavery was never abolished, it was only extended to include all the colors.
